plot: As the team mourns the loss of Stephen Hart, Lester recruits Captain Becker to prevent any more deaths. They're sent to the British Museum where a creature resembling the ancient Egyptian deity Ammut is on the loose.

A crocodilian, a creature from the Eocene period which was mistaken for a god and worshipped in ancient Egypt is released through an anomaly whilst on display at an Egyptian exhibition at the British Museum. It kills the curator, Marion and flees across London, diving into the Thames. Cutter recruits Dr. Sarah Page, Marion's assistant, to help his team retrieve it.—don @ minifie-1
